info.title: WaAPI API
info.description: WaAPI is a simple API gateway for sending WhatsApp messages. On top of that, you are able to fully control your virtual WhatsApp application just by sending simple REST API requests.

get.description: Retrieve a list of your instances.
Retrieve a single instance by its ID

requestBody.description: To reset the value, apply `null` for `url` or `[]` for `events`

get.description: retrieve the status of your running client
retrieve a base64 encoded QR Code of your instance
retrieve general information of the whatsapp user conntected to your instance

post.description: Send a message to a contact or group

message.example: This is a test message. and I mention @123456789 and @987654321

items.description: optional, array of contactIds to mention. Make sure to include the client number in the message like: @123456789. Mentions only work with group chats.

mentions.description: optional, array of contactIds to mention. Make sure to include the client number in the message like: @123456789. Mentions only work with group chats.

200.description: return a full Message Object in `_data`
return a full Message Object in `_data`

waid.description: optional, first part of the chatId (<xxxxx>@c.us). Makes sure the contact is shown with an image and added to Whatsapp contacts properly.

lastname.description: optional, last name of the contact

firstname.description: optional, first name of the contact

title.description: optional, title of the contact, like Mr or Ms

street.description: optional, street and number of the contact

post.description: Send a location to a contact or group

address.example: 1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA

200.description: return a full Location Object in `_data`
return a chat list Object in `data`

fromMe.description: optional, if nothing is provided, all messages will be included

includeMedia.description: optional, can make the request very slow, use with caution
optional, include media base64 encoded if enabled

messageId.description: serialized messageId, fromMe_chatId_hash or for groups fromMe_groupId_messageHash_senderId

forEveryone.description: optional, delete message for all users or just for you, default: false

Returns the contact ID's profile picture URL, if privacy settings allow it.
